Gartner® Market Guide for Revenue Enablement Platforms ","content":"

 

Sales enablement has evolved. Again.

In the span of a few years sales enablement has grown from niche to “nice to have” to essential to the sales process and tech stack. Now it has expanded beyond sales and marketing to include all revenue-generating and customer-facing roles.

Having trouble keeping up? Wondering how this affects your organization’s enablement efforts or platform purchase?

Read the Gartner Market report to understand:

  • Why “sales enablement” has been redefined as “revenue enablement”
  • How different roles use enablement tools and strategies and how best to equip them
  • How vendors and practitioners are responding
  • The offerings of different platform vendors
  • The latest developments in enablement technology
  • Which technology to adopt now to stay ahead of buyer behaviors

Download now to use The Gartner Market Guide as a resource to review vendors and the key capabilities offered.

Gartner, Market Guide for Revenue Enablement Platforms, Melissa Hilbert, Elizabeth Beard, Rahim Kaba, Doug Bushée, 8 August 2022.
